game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization.
game.reward: A chest full of gold coins

task.description: Search the abandoned island for the hidden cave that holds the ancient map leading to the treasure.
Explore the mysterious dungeon to retrieve the key that will unlock the hidden chamber where the treasure is kept.
Battle the legendary guardian to protect the treasure.
Open the treasure chest with the key and claim the long-lost riches.
